dcterms:creator: Ryan Lowe
Nissan Pow
Iulian Serban
Joelle Pineau
dcterms:description: The Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus (UDC) is the largest publicly available multi-turn, dyadic, and domain-specific dialogue dataset, extracted from Ubuntu-related topic-specific chat rooms in the Freenode Internet Relay Chat (IRC) network.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus (UDC)

dcterms:creator: Wang Hao
Lu Zhengdong
Li Hang
dcterms:description: A dataset for research on short-text conversation, focusing on response selection based on context.
dcterms:title: A dataset for research on short-text conversation
